abstract: SAC Capital, the giant hedge fund run by Steven Cohen, has recently invested in some of the same companies as the activist investor Carl C. Icahn, a coincidence that The New York Post said links investors with very different styles.
lead_paragraph: SAC Capital, the giant hedge fund run by Steven Cohen, has recently invested in some of the same companies as the activist investor Carl C. Icahn, a coincidence that The New York Post said links investors with very different styles.

headline.main: The SAC and Icahn: Different Styles Linked by Investments
